column2: Adds a claim to this title to your character.
Changes the succession law of this title to primogeniture.
Changes the succession law of this title to gavelkind.
Changes the succession law of this title to elective gavelkind.
Changes the succession law of this title to seniority.
Changes the succession law of this title to ultimogeniture.
Changes the succession law of this title to tanistry.
Changes the succession law of this title to elective.
Changes the succession law of this title to open.
Changes the gender succession law of this title to agnatic.
Changes the gender succession law of this title to enatic.
Changes the gender succession law of this title to agnatic-cognatic.
Changes the gender succession law of this title to absolute cognatic.
Changes the gender succession law of this title to enatic-cognatic.
